00010 #define WALLHIGHT 2.0
00011 #define WALLDEPTH 0.2
00012 
00013 WallMediator::WallMediator()
00014 {
00015         //ctor
00016 }

00022 
00023 void WallMediator::initialize(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00024 {
00025         //backup old startpoint
00026         endPoint = startPoint;
00027 
00028         //reset moved flag
00029         moved = false;
00030 
00031         window_w = event.getWinX();
00032         window_h = event.getWinY();
00033 
00034         gl_xmax = event.getWorldXmax();
00035         gl_xmin = event.getWorldXmin();
00036 
00037         gl_zmax = event.getWorldZmax();
00038         gl_zmin = event.getWorldZmin();
00039 
00040         m_mouse_x = event.getMouseEvent().GetX();
00041         m_mouse_y = event.getMouseEvent().GetY();
00042 
00043         float x = gl_xmin + (float) m_mouse_x / (float) window_w * (gl_xmax-gl_xmin);
00044         float z = gl_zmax + (float) m_mouse_y / (float) window_h * (gl_zmin-gl_zmax);
00045 
00046         doSnapMove(x);
00047         doSnapMove(z);
00048 
00049         startPoint.setX(x);
00050         startPoint.setY(0.01);
00051         startPoint.setZ(z);
00052 }
00053 
00054 int WallMediator::translate(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00055 {
00056         moved = true;
00057 
00058         float x = startPoint.getX() - (gl_xmax-gl_xmin)*(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/window_w;
00059         float z = startPoint.getZ() - (gl_xmax-gl_xmin)/window_w*(m_mouse_y - event.getMouseEvent().GetY());
00060 
00061         doSnapMove(x);
00062         doSnapMove(z);
00063 
00064         endPoint.setX(x);
00065         endPoint.setY(0.01);
00066         endPoint.setZ(z);
00067 
00068         // send event to draw current scene
00069         LineDrawEvent myevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_LINE_DRAW);
00070         myevent.SetEventObject(this);
00071         myevent.setStartPoint(startPoint);
00072         myevent.setEndPoint(endPoint);
00073         ProcessEvent(myevent);
00074 
00075         return 1;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void WallMediator::finalize()
00079 {
00080         float deltaX = endPoint.getX() - startPoint.getX();
00081         float deltaZ = endPoint.getZ() - startPoint.getZ();
00082         float length = sqrt(deltaX*deltaX + deltaZ*deltaZ);
00083 
00084         // set middle point of the wall
00085         Vertex middlePoint;
00086         middlePoint.setX((endPoint.getX() + startPoint.getX()) / 2.0);
00087         middlePoint.setY(WALLHIGHT / 2.0);
00088         middlePoint.setZ((endPoint.getZ() + startPoint.getZ()) / 2.0);
00089 
00090         double beta = atan2(deltaZ, deltaX) * -180 / M_PI;
00091         Vertex orientation(0, beta, 0);
00092         Vertex dimension(length, WALLHIGHT, WALLDEPTH);
00093 
00094         // send event to create cuboid
00095         CreatePrimitiveEvent myevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_CREATE_PRIMITIVE);
00096         myevent.SetEventObject(this);
00097         myevent.setPrimitiveType(CUBOID);
00098         myevent.setPosition(middlePoint);
00099         myevent.setAngles(orientation);
00100         myevent.setDimensions(dimension);
00101         ProcessEvent(myevent);
00102 
00103         if (moved)
00104         {
00105                 //if moved, store endpoint
00106                 startPoint = endPoint;
00107         }
00108 }
